common.welcome: Welcome to Retro AI Agent Assistant

agents.deepResearchAgentDesc: Specializes in comprehensive research and information synthesis
agents.productManagerAgentDesc: Handles product requirements and feature planning
agents.frontendDeveloperAgentDesc: Specializes in UI/UX implementation and frontend technologies
agents.backendDeveloperAgentDesc: Focuses on server-side logic and API implementation

deepResearch.title: Deep Research Feature
deepResearch.description: Professor Đạt Văn Tây uses intelligent web search technology and document analysis capabilities to provide accurate and comprehensive information.
deepResearch.feature1_description: Automatically searches the web for the latest and most reliable information on your topic.
deepResearch.feature2_description: Synthesizes information from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive view.
deepResearch.feature3_description: Transforms complex information into clear, easy-to-understand insights.
deepResearch.feature4_description: Verifies information from multiple sources to ensure reliability.
deepResearch.try_button: Try now with Professor Đạt Văn Tây

chat.agent_intro: I am Professor Đạt Văn Tây!
chat.agent_description: I'm a Professor, I know everything
chat.ask_about: Ask me about programming, your projects, issues you're facing...
chat.agent_help: Đạt Văn Tây will answer your questions in detail.
chat.file_upload_hint: Send files for Đạt Văn Tây to analyze and help you understand the content.
chat.stop_hint: Click stop to ask a new question
